languages.text: Upon using {g|f:916fcf40f9cc410f9b0a810516089207}Death Waltz{/g}, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g} immediately heals to full. The cost of {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} that cost {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} is reduced by half until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Upon using {g|f:916fcf40f9cc410f9b0a810516089207}Death Waltz{/g}, the Bladedancer immediately heals to full. The cost of abilities that cost wounds is reduced by half until the end of combat.

Upon using {g|f:916fcf40f9cc410f9b0a810516089207}Death Waltz{/g}, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g} immediately heals to full. The cost of {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} that cost {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} is reduced by half until the end of combat.

languages.text: Al usar {g|f:916fcf40f9cc410f9b0a810516089207}Vals de la muerte{/g}, el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}hoja danzante{/g} recupera todas sus heridas de inmediato. El coste de las {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g} que consumen {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} se reduce a la mitad hasta el final del combate.
languages.original_text: Upon using {g|f:916fcf40f9cc410f9b0a810516089207}Death Waltz{/g}, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g} immediately heals to full. The cost of {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} that cost {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} is reduced by half until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Al usar {g|f:916fcf40f9cc410f9b0a810516089207}Vals de la muerte{/g}, el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}hoja danzante{/g} recupera todas sus heridas de inmediato. El coste de las {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g} que consumen {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} se reduce a la mitad hasta el final del combate.

languages.text: {g|f:916fcf40f9cc410f9b0a810516089207}死のワルツ{/g}の使用に際して、{g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}ブレードダンサー{/g}は即座に完全回復する。{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}を消費する{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}のコストは、戦闘が終了するまで、半分に減少する。
languages.original_text: Upon using {g|f:916fcf40f9cc410f9b0a810516089207}Death Waltz{/g}, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g} immediately heals to full. The cost of {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} that cost {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} is reduced by half until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: {g|f:916fcf40f9cc410f9b0a810516089207}死のワルツ{/g}の使用に際して、{g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}ブレードダンサー{/g}は即座に完全回復する。{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}を消費する{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}のコストは、戦闘が終了するまで、半分に減少する。

languages.text: 发动{g|f:916fcf40f9cc410f9b0a810516089207}死亡华尔兹{/g}时，{g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}刀锋舞者{/g}立刻恢复全部生命值，且所有{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}消耗的{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}减半，效果持续至战斗结束。
languages.original_text: Upon using {g|f:916fcf40f9cc410f9b0a810516089207}Death Waltz{/g}, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g} immediately heals to full. The cost of {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} that cost {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} is reduced by half until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: 发动{g|f:916fcf40f9cc410f9b0a810516089207}死亡华尔兹{/g}时，{g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}刀锋舞者{/g}立刻恢复全部生命值，且所有{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}消耗的{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}减半，效果持续至战斗结束。

languages.text: Lorsqu'il utilise {g|f:916fcf40f9cc410f9b0a810516089207}Valse mortelle{/g}, le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}danselame{/g} récupère tous ses points de vie et voit le coût en {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} de ses {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g} réduit de moitié jusqu'à la fin du combat.
languages.original_text: Upon using {g|f:916fcf40f9cc410f9b0a810516089207}Death Waltz{/g}, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g} immediately heals to full. The cost of {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} that cost {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} is reduced by half until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Lorsqu'il utilise {g|f:916fcf40f9cc410f9b0a810516089207}Valse mortelle{/g}, le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}danselame{/g} récupère tous ses points de vie et voit le coût en {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} de ses {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g} réduit de moitié jusqu'à la fin du combat.

languages.text: Beim Einsetzen von {g|f:916fcf40f9cc410f9b0a810516089207}Todeswalzer{/g} wird der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Klingentänzer{/g} sofort vollständig geheilt. Die Kosten von {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g}, die {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} kosten, werden bis zum Ende des Kampfes halbiert.
languages.original_text: Upon using {g|f:916fcf40f9cc410f9b0a810516089207}Death Waltz{/g}, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g} immediately heals to full. The cost of {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} that cost {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} is reduced by half until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Beim Einsetzen von {g|f:916fcf40f9cc410f9b0a810516089207}Todeswalzer{/g} wird der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Klingentänzer{/g} sofort vollständig geheilt. Die Kosten von {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g}, die {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} kosten, werden bis zum Ende des Kampfes halbiert.

languages.text: Применив {g|f:916fcf40f9cc410f9b0a810516089207}Вальс смерти{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}танцор смерти{/g} сразу же полностью восстанавливает здоровье. Стоимость {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способностей{/g}, требующих затрат {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}, сокращается вдвое до конца боя.
